title: Redeemers
description: Happily Ever After...They say that if you don't have your happy ending, the story isn't over.They have no idea just how right they are.This story is only just beginning...And it begins with a bang.Aimee James, along with every dream and every person she has ever loved, has changed. Each of the people she loves is holding onto their humanity by a thread that gets thinner each day.But not Aimee.She has something tying her to her mortal heart.A single feather.What started with a kiss will end with a kiss.
author: Tara Brown
